value.name: George Floyd's life was celebrated one year after his killing sparked a worldwide movement for racial justice
value.description: From Berlin to Minneapolis, people protested, held vigils, and took a knee to remember George Floyd on the anniversary of his death.

value.name: ‘It’s OK to be mad’: L.A.-area people killed by police mourned 1 year after George Floyd’s murder
value.description: A year ago, protests filled the streets of Los Angeles and other communities for weeks. Demonstrators said Tuesday there is still much work to be done.

value.name: On anniversary of George Floyd’s death, L.A. rally declares, ‘Black lives matter everywhere’

value.name: George Floyd Honored At LA Rally For Racial Justice

value.name: Family Of Man Shot, Killed By LAPD Officers Call For Their Firing

value.name: A timeline of the Black Lives Matter movement
value.description: As they marked five years of action, Black Lives Matter continued to highlight the deaths of Black people who had lost their lives at the hands of US police that year, including Grechario Mack and Kenneth Ross Jr. In February 2019, the rapper 21 Savage was ...
